headline: UBS Raises PT on Applied Materials (AMAT) Stock, Maintains Neutral Rating
summary: Applied Materials, Inc. (NASDAQ:AMAT) is one of the Most Undervalued Semiconductor Stocks to Buy According to Analysts.
